title: SOLD: 1908 Fuller Brothers Cubs PC SGC 10
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1908 Fuller Brothers Cubs PC SGC 10
posts.post_content:
Very rare 1908 Fuller Brothers Postcard picturing the Chicago Cubs team after winning the World Series.  Included are Hall of Famers Brown, Chance, Evers and Tinker.  Just two graded by SGC.

Card was postally used, postmarked Chicago and "Noencia Postal, Colon."  Foreign?  I have no idea.  The writing includes the following:

"Dear Bill, This is the team that has held the championship for 3 years goin ..."
  Email or PM if interested. 

[img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1163/5148503551_e87a9ab0f3_z.jpg[/img]
